column4: hello room. may i need help about Keyboard. why my keyboard suddenly not working when type a number (only number) in number right side?
num lock on?
sorry, I had to ask you never know :)
still having problems?
does ctrl shift numlock work?
does ctrl shift numlock work?
do ctrl+shift+numlock
you can change that in sys > prefs
sorry man, try typing exodu<tab>
do you have sys > prefs > keyboard ?
you might also want to look at sys > prefs > assistive technologies > mouse keys
yes then what?
do you have anything check in that menu
there is 5 menu which menu should fix?
I wouldnt worry about it. using ctrl+shift+numlock will turn that behaviour off and on
look in Mouse Keys
yes i had look and i'm not checked, then?
your good man, using ctrl+shift+numlock turn that feature on or off, you have it turned off now so you should be good
okay terimakasih
you can either turn it off by using ctrl+shift+numlock  or use the menu
thanks a lot GURU
